subject: New guy saying hi from Oklahoma
author: Ron
full_text:
Hello everyone: I just joined this site.
strange...It feels like when you walk into
a room where people have been arguing and there's
a lot of tension in the air.

I'm here because im very intrested in the evp's
I'd hope to make or buy some equipment at some point

Eell you all have a great day I'll see ya later

Ron
